pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modified Detecting Deviating Cells Algorithm in Pharmacovigilance // Methods for detecting signals related to (adverse event, medical product e.g. drugs, vaccines) pairs, a data generation function for simulating pharmacovigilance datasets, and various utility functions. For more details please see Liu A., Mukhopadhyay R., and Markatou M. doi:10.48550/arXiv.2410.01168.
